description: Fullstack Web Development education, with a focus on .NET and Microsoft services. The program is mainly focused on C#, .NET and Microsofts tools for developers, but also contains frontend technologys including, but not limited to, HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, React Vite, and Bootstrap.
